author: Colin Powell
content: Success is the result of perfection, hard work, learning from failure, loyalty, and persistence.

author: Shiv Khera
content: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.

author: Virat Kohli
content: Self-belief and hard work will always earn you success.

author: Edward Everett Hale
content: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.

author: Doug Larson
content: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success!

author: Salvador Dali
content: The thermometer of success is merely the jealousy of the malcontents.

author: Bobby Unser
content: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.

author: Earl Wilson
content: Success is simply a matter of luck. Ask any failure.

author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
content: Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.

author: Shah Rukh Khan
content: Success is not a good teacher, failure makes you humble.

author: Benjamin Franklin
content: Without continual growth and progress, such words as improvement, achievement, and success have no meaning.

author: Morihei Ueshiba
content: Failure is the key to success; each mistake teaches us something.

author: Joyce Brothers
content: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.

author: Paul J. Meyer
content: Communication - the human connection - is the key to personal and career success.

author: Mark Twain
content: All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence, and then success is sure.

author: Winston Churchill
content: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.

author: Walter Scott
content: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.

author: Napoleon Hill
content: Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.

author: David Joseph Schwartz
content: Think little goals and expect little achievements. Think big goals and win big success.

author: Oscar Wilde
content: Success is a science; if you have the conditions, you get the result.

author: Bill Gates
content: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.

author: Benjamin Disraeli
content: The secret of success is to be ready when your opportunity comes.

author: John C. Maxwell
content: The secret of your success is determined by your daily agenda.

author: Stephen Hawking
content: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.

author: Nelson Mandela
content: Money won't create success, the freedom to make it will.

author: Sun Yat-sen
content: The key to success is action, and the essential in action is perseverance.

author: Bill Bradley
content: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.

author: Henry Ford
content: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.

author: Patricia Cornwell
content: Survival was my only hope, success my only revenge.

author: Heather Bresch
content: There is simply no substitute for hard work when it comes to achieving success.

author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
content: Earn your success based on service to others, not at the expense of others.

author: Billie Jean King
content: A champion is afraid of losing. Everyone else is afraid of winning.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: Try to look at your weakness and convert it into your strength. That's success.

author: Napoleon Hill
content: The starting point of all achievement is desire.

author: Diego Luna
content: There is no success you can celebrate more than the success of a brother.

author: Alexander Graham Bell
content: Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.

author: Arnold H. Glasow
content: Success is simple. Do what's right, the right way, at the right time.

author: Aeschylus
content: Obedience is the mother of success and is wedded to safety.

author: Henry David Thoreau
content: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.

author: Tony Robbins
content: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.

author: Andy Grove
content: Success breeds complacency. Complacency breeds failure. Only the paranoid survive.

author: Warren Bennis
content: Success in management requires learning as fast as the world is changing.

author: Frank Sinatra
content: The best revenge is massive success.

author: Shah Rukh Khan
content: Success and failure are both part of life. Both are not permanent.

author: John Ruskin
content: When love and skill work together, expect a masterpiece.

author: Vivek Wadhwa
content: A key to achieving success is to assemble a strong and stable management team.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
content: Four things for success: work and pray, think and believe.

author: Ramana Maharshi
content: No one succeeds without effort... Those who succeed owe their success to perseverance.

author: Dale Carnegie
content: The successful man will profit from his mistakes and try again in a different way.

author: Isaac Newton
content: My powers are ordinary. Only my application brings me success.

author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
content: Man needs his difficulties because they are necessary to enjoy success.

author: George S. Patton
content: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.

author: Audrey Hepburn
content: Success is like reaching an important birthday and finding you're exactly the same.

author: John F. Kennedy
content: Victory has a thousand fathers, but defeat is an orphan.

author: Arnold Palmer
content: The road to success is always under construction.

author: Ayn Rand
content: The ladder of success is best climbed by stepping on the rungs of opportunity.

author: John Wooden
content: Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: You cannot climb the ladder of success dressed in the costume of failure.

author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
content: Just remember, you can't climb the ladder of success with your hands in your pockets.

author: Wilma Mankiller
content: The secret of our success is that we never, never give up.

author: William Eardley IV
content: Ambition is the path to success, persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.

author: Earl Nightingale
content: Success is the progressive realization of a worthy goal or ideal.

author: Jim Rohn
content: Success is steady progress toward one's personal goals.

author: Aisha Tyler
content: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure.

author: Albert Einstein
content: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.

author: Bruce Feirstein
content: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success.

author: Arthur Ashe
content: One important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation.

author: Arnold H. Glasow
content: Success isn't a result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.

author: Florence Nightingale
content: I attribute my success to this - I never gave or took any excuse.

author: Bruce Rauner
content: Success is all about persistence and doing the right thing for the long term.

author: Bear Bryant
content: Winning isn’t everything, but it sure beats anything that comes in second.

author: Judy Smith
content: The ambition and focus that propel you to success can also be your downfall.

author: Christopher Reeve
content: Success is finding satisfaction in giving a little more than you take.

author: Dale Carnegie
content: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.

author: Henry Ford
content: Before everything else, getting ready is the secret of success.

author: George Allen, Sr.
content: Success is what you do with your ability. It's how you use your talent.

author: Thomas J. Watson
content: If you want to increase your success rate, double your failure rate.

author: Benjamin Disraeli
content: Through perseverance many people win success out of what seemed destined to be certain failure.

author: Woody Allen
content: Eighty percent of success is showing up.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: You were designed for accomplishment, engineered for success, and endowed with the seeds of greatness.

author: Confucius
content: Success depends upon previous preparation, and without such preparation there is sure to be failure.

author: Sun Tzu
content: Invincibility lies in the defence; the possibility of victory in the attack.

author: Simon Mainwaring
content: The keys to brand success are self-definition, transparency, authenticity and accountability.

author: Johnny Cash
content: Success is having to worry about every damn thing in the world, except money.

author: W. Clement Stone
content: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.

author: Michelle Obama
content: Success is only meaningful and enjoyable if it feels like your own.

author: J. Paul Getty
content: Formula for success: rise early, work hard, strike oil.

author: Miguel de Cervantes
content: To be prepared is half the victory.

author: Andrew Carnegie
content: There is little success where there is little laughter.

author: Harold S. Geneen
content: The five essential entrepreneurial skills for success: Concentration, Discrimination, Organization, Innovation and Communication.

author: Emily Dickinson
content: Fortune befriends the bold.

author: Paramahansa Yogananda
content: The season of failure is the best time for sowing the seeds of success.

author: Coco Chanel
content: Success is often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.

author: Michael Diamond
content: Success for an athlete follows many years of hard work and dedication.

author: Julia Child
content: Find something you're passionate about and keep tremendously interested in it.

author: Pablo Picasso
content: Action is the foundational key to all success.

author: Lydia M. Child
content: Belief in oneself is one of the most important bricks in building any successful venture.

author: W. Clement Stone
content: Success is achieved and maintained by those who try and keep trying.

author: Leonard Cohen
content: Success is survival.

author: Bo Bennett
content: Frustration, although quite painful at times, is a very positive and essential part of success.

author: Jim Rohn
content: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.

author: Vince Lombardi
content: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.

author: Malcolm X
content: If you have no critics you'll likely have no success.

author: Conor McGregor
content: My success isn't a result of arrogance - it's a result of belief.

author: Napoleon Hill
content: The ladder of success is never crowded at the top.

author: Bear Bryant
content: There's a lot of blood, sweat, and guts between dreams and success.

author: Robert Collier
content: Success is the sum of small efforts - repeated day in and day out.

author: Gordon Ramsay
content: I've had a lot of success; I've had failures, so I learn from the failure.

author: Walter Scott
content: Success - keeping your mind awake and your desire asleep.

author: Sam Ewing
content: Success has a simple formula: do your best, and people may like it.

author: Erma Bombeck
content: Don't confuse fame with success. Madonna is one; Helen Keller is the other.

author: F. Gary Gray
content: Success is really about your mindset.

author: Bobby Davro
content: The measure of success is happiness and peace of mind.
